ygData.subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Everquest Secrets?
ygData.msgSnippet: My guess would be he s smoking out people who are trying to pass around copies of the password without paying, but that s just a guess. I mean if he s dumb
ygData.messageBody:
My guess would be he's smoking out people who are trying to pass around
copies of the password without paying, but that's just a guess. I mean if
he's dumb enough to put his email on this maybe he did forget his own
password.

-----Original Message-----
From: Charles Lembke [mailto:c-lembke@...]
Sent: Thursday, October 12, 2000 3:41 PM
To: 'EQ-Monks@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Everquest Secrets?


So why does the person who originates all the email in the EQ-Cheats list,
and runs www.eqtotalsecrets.com need the password to his own site?

-----Original Message-----
From: Rick [mailto:craigba@...]
Sent: Thursday, October 12, 2000 1:59 PM
To: EQ-Monks@egroups.com
Subject: [EQ-Monks] Everquest Secrets?


Has anyone ever heard of this EQ Bugs/Secrets web site?

http://www.eqtotalsecrets.com

Please email me the password if you have it. I want all the cool
info but I don't want to have to pay for it

Thanks
